text: haey chaur puok anak korp brate b tde tam a l laoh ning anak noam sar robsa trong haey komaoy puok anak khvengyobl knea aoy saoh pi proh vea thveu aoy puok anak breachy ning batbng pheap khlangokla robsa puok anak . haey chaur puok anak atthmot . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh nowchea muoy banda anak del atthmot
